item.title: What to know about the murder trial of a sheriff deputy who killed Sonya Massey
item.description: An Illinois sheriff's deputy goes on trial this week in the death of Sonya Massey

item.title: Man who appeared to fake his death and flee to the UK faces sentencing for Utah rape
item.description: A U.S. man who authorities say faked his death and fled to the United Kingdom to avoid rape charges is scheduled to be sentenced in Utah on Monday

item.title: Trump administration to defend Alina Habba's tenure as top New Jersey prosecutor
item.description: A federal appeals court is set to hear arguments over whether President Donald Trump’s former lawyer, Alina Habba, has been unlawfully serving as the ...

item.title: China accuses US of cyberattack on national time center
item.description: China has accused the U.S. National Security Agency of cyberattacks on its national time center

item.title: Thousands of Orthodox Jews rally in New York to protest change in Israel's military draft rules
item.description: Protesters have marched near the Israeli consulate in New York City over issues including the drafting of ultra-Orthodox Jews into Israel’s military
